<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bind staged transaction to recurring pattern"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/import-sessions/{id}/bind"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Bind a staged transaction to a recurring transaction pattern. Automatically copies category, subcategory, tags, and description from the recurring pattern.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Session ID","name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["recurring_transaction_id","staged_transaction_id"],"properties":{"recurring_transaction_id":{"type":"string"},"staged_transaction_id":{"type":"string"}}}}},"description":"Bind request","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
